name: Hitch2Cloud
tag_list: salesforce-com, isv, gotomeeting, replicon, software, integration, connector
overview:
Hitch2Cloud creates solutions on the salesforce.com platform for Enterprise customers.

Connecting two systems together has historically been a big and expensive project. Hitch2Cloud focuses on leveraging the Force.com platform to create simple to use and seamless integrations available to customers big and small.

By knowing who is showing up to webinars or training sessions, Hitch2Cloud Connector of GoToMeeting for Salesforce looks to help drive increased sales to sales organizations and increased customer experience information to professional services teams.

Hitch2Cloud is a salesforce.com partner with alumni from world leading cloud computing companies.
